1450960.name: RPG Maker MZ - Marsha Erin Character Pack
1450960.description:
Marsha Erin is a character from Japanese RPG Maker Official Store Twitter (Tkool Official Store Twitter). She is so adorable that we made a mini pack just about her!

With matching Walking sprites, Side-View animated Battlers, Front facing Battlers, Facesets and Bust-up portraits with emotions, you'll be able to choose if she will be the party leader or an interesting character who joins the party along the journey.

Add more and more cool characters to your RPG Maker Library to expand the fantastic world of your story!

Marsha Erin comes with;
  • Walking character sprites
  • Side-view animated battlers
  • Facesets with emotions: 9 graphics
  • Front-facing battlers (static) with emotions: 9 graphics
  • Bust-up images with emotions: 9 graphics
  • BONUS: 1 Side-facing battler (static) and a cut in graphic: in png and psd files

This pack is for use in RPG Makers, Visual Novel games or the engine of your choice. However, you must contact Degica if you are a corporate entity using the material in this pack whether it's commercial or non commercial use.
1450960.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
